price: 54. Y (recuerda a tu gente, ¡oh, Muhammad!) cuando Lot dijo a su pueblo: «¿Cometéis una inmoralidad (la homosexualidad) cuando veis claramente(que es abominable)?
arabic: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمۡ تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walūṭan idh qāla liqawmihi atatūna al-fāḥishata wa-antum tub'ṣirūna
